text:
Second-hand Dealers and Pawnbrokers (Exemption) Order 2012

I make the following order under section 3(3) of the Second-hand Dealers and Pawnbrokers Act 1994 .

9 February 2012

NICK MCKIM

Minister for Corrections and Consumer Protection

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Second-hand Dealers and Pawnbrokers (Exemption) Order 2012 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 April 2012.

3. Interpretation
    In this order â€“
        Act means the Second-hand Dealers and Pawnbrokers Act 1994 .

4. Licensed motor vehicle traders exempt from Act
    A licensed motor vehicle trader, within the meaning of the Motor Vehicle Traders Act 2011 , engaged in the trade of dealing in motor vehicles is exempt from the operation of the Act.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 March 2012

This order is administered in the Department of Justice.
